---
title: "Community Coding"
format: 
  html:

    css: styles.css
---

<!-- Banner Section -->
<div class="banner">
    <!-- Left Side: Text Description -->
    <div class="left">
        <h1>Your Heading Here</h1>
        <p>Your description text goes here. This is where you can provide information about your website or company.</p>
    </div>
    <!-- Right Side: Photo Roll with Scrolling Pictures -->
    <div class="right">
        <div class="slides">
            <img src="images/image1.jpg" alt="Image 1">
            <img src="images/image2.jpg" alt="Image 2">
            <img src="images/image3.jpg" alt="Image 3">
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- Additional Text Section -->
<div class="text-section">
    <h2>Additional Information</h2>
    <p>This is another spot for text below the landing banner. You can add more details here.</p>
</div>

<!-- Google Calendar Embed -->
<div class="calendar">
    <!-- Replace with your actual Google Calendar embed code -->
    <iframe src="https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=your_calendar_id&ctz=Your_Timezone" style="border: 0" width="100%" height="600" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
</div>
